Summary: huge blinkin light at 1st then tons of colors and it was a disc like a mile away
divs: sighting detailsme and two of my friends were standing outside off my house talking. i looked in the distance and we all could see this huge blinking light almost like a star rising straight up from the woods across the street from my house. it got to a certain point in the sky and the bright white light stopped and then we seen blue,green,yellow,red,orange, and more colors jus goin around in a circle around the saucer shapped object. then it started moving... you could hear this loud rumble in the sky and it was sooooooooo loud like rocket booster kicked on but it was moving slow at 1st. it was like basically right above us then we all started freakin out cuz we didnt kno what was goin on haa it was jus goin slow for a while prolly a good 2 er 3 mins n then it jus basically disipeared. i am 100 percent positive that was an alien ship and so are my both friends... if you seen it you would totally believe 100 percent in aliens. i kno aliens are here on earth right this second as we speak. the reptillians and greys are here. and we all are played with and brainwashed everyday. soon enough we all will know the truth hopefully... but back to my sighting. after i seen it i ran in and told my mom but she didnt believe me hahaha every night after that i went out with a camera so i could try to prove her wrong fer like a month er two straight but i never seen anything quite like that. u can say im crazy or whatever but [cms\tg\pd] i kno what i saw n what i saw was 100 percent an alien ship. probally a mother ship since the size of it was so humonguos. its funny too cuz a week later i heard that 1 of my neighbors a couple streets down the road heard the rumble in the sky cuz it was so loud n seen it too but i never got to talk to her personally... but im happy i found a site where i can finally let people kno thats aliens are really out their. you all have to open up your eyes n see whats really goin on here.thank you..
